author: agemanning
content:
Some nodes support discovery on UDP. Discovery starts its handshake with a specific packet and provides a response to establish a handshake. 
Nodes also support libp2p on TCP where we negotiate the encryption with multistream select. I've not done it before but I think you could nc a request for protocols. would have to look up the multistream select specs.

author: Deleted User
content: <@!720696269978337280> would https://github.com/mxinden/libp2p-lookup be of any help?
